title: Okay, the more I think about it the dumber it gets (Mordekaiser's W ^^'')
body:
After playing around with Mordekaiser post 5.18 I've come to the conclusion that there's no valid excuse to NOT make Mordekaiser get the damage AoE from his Harvester if not standing right next to an ally.
With the removal of "Metallic Mastery" the ability got a lot weaker, heck it's literally only half as strong and yet has such a ridiculous condition to be fulfilled in order to get the full potential.
It was nerfed quite a bit and it really isn't powerful enough to have such a dumb restriction to it and I just can't find ANY reason to make it such a conditional spell. 
Giving him access to the full spell would be quite nice for us Solo lane MordHue's and allow Riot to add some more Metal effects into it (Rito pls!)
Because as of now you can't push by yourself and the ability's damage doesn't justify the lack of availability.

But that might just be my Mordekaiser bias, maybe YOU can tell me why he can't have the bloody thing :)

replies.body: Rito's weird

Wrong, they dont want mordekaiser to ever play solo anymore.
To all those that claim Morde kept his identity, he's completely lost his ability to wave clear well, which to me was something that was part of his identity.

I agree it feels weird, I made another post a few days back because honestly I thought it was a bug. In reply on that post someone said "It makes him feel a bit weird, almost unfinished" and I'm inclined to agree with him.

There was a thread kicking around yesterday that had the math for the damage and healing (including scaling) of Mordekaiser's new W. It was quite in-depth, and I wish I had bookmarked it now. But overall, if you don't use Mordekaiser's heal against enemy champions, it doesn't even heal. With the introduction of a scaling health cost, the drop down to 25% damage against minions, and the reduction of maximum units hit down to 2, the health you gain doesn't even outweigh the health cost. The new W is hilariously laughable for solo lane Mordekaiser, because you also lose access the DoT aura it has aswell. I'm amazed by how much this change missed the target by, and I hope Riot feel that they can rectify this error at some point this year.

My guess is that they're leaving it weak because they've shifted ALL the damage onto his Q. Unless that damage gets moved, it's unlikely he'll get an major damage buffs elsewhere.

Even if it wouldn't make him much stronger, it would make Mordekaiser actually feel like a complete champion again.

That's why I've resigned myself to playing duo bot mord when I have a premade duo partner.  He's no fun to play solo period right now unless you get super fed and can 1v3 (2v3 if you count the dragon) late game and most of the time that only happens if you play him duo bot with a high cc/hook support or get babysat by the jungler to get fed. The reactivation damage doesn't do anything when you're by yourself and while you still have plenty of waveclear with your Q and E, being limited to 2 skills and an ult that doesn't do much if you already can't 1v1 early game makes early game horrible.

His W is fine as it is for the self-cast. It's not too good but 70 health when you're in melee range if your opponent is pretty significant.
